Subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Atom, 'process-this'-POST and rockets

Elliotte Harold wrote:
> 
> 
> Paul Downey wrote:
>
>  > 3) as essential as PUT and DELETE are, they're blocked by many
>  > firewall/proxies and it's a brave API developer who
>  > depends upon them ..
> 
> Yes, that's a problem, though I really don't think that tunneling PUT
> and DELETE through GET and POST is the solution. I tend to believe that
> firewall preferences should be respected. If someone has chosen to block
> the functionality of PUT and DELETE, then that's there decision and we
> should respect it.

PUT maybe I can live without; tunneling DELETE over POST is nauseating.

But this thing about firewalls is a tad backways. Firewall admins don't 
really want to block PUT and DELETE (that's the DBA's job). I think the 
admins also learned from subsetted examples.

cheers
Bill
